select f.UUID,f.film_name,f.film_type,f.img_address, f.film_score,f.film_preSaleNum,f.film_box_office, f.film_cats,f.film_area,f.film_time, fi.film_length from mtime_film_t f left join mtime_film_info_t fi on f.UUID=fi.film_id order by f.film_preSaleNum
